Show action buttons in collapsed toots

Glitchsoc is open source software, a friendly fork of {Mastodon}. You can contribute or report issues on GitHub at {github}.
Are you sure you want to mute {name}?
This will hide posts from them and posts mentioning them, but it will still allow them to see your posts and follow you.
{domain} is an "instance" of Mastodon. Mastodon is a network of independent servers joining up to make one larger social network. We call these servers instances.
You are on {domain}, so your full handle is {handle}
Write posts from the compose column. You can upload images, change privacy settings, and add content warnings with the icons below.
Use the search bar to find people and look at hashtags, such as {illustration} and {introductions}. To look for a person who is not on this instance, use their full handle.
Edit your profile to change your avatar, bio, and display name. There, you will also find other preferences.
The home timeline shows posts from people you follow.
The notifications column shows when someone interacts with you.

The local timeline shows public posts from everyone on {domain}. The federated timeline shows public posts from everyone who people on {domain} follow. These are the Public Timelines, a great way to discover new people.

{domain} runs on Glitchsoc. Glitchsoc is a friendly {fork} of {Mastodon}. Glitchsoc is fully compatible with all Mastodon apps and instances. Glitchsoc is free open-source software. You can report bugs, request features, or contribute to the code on {github}.
There are {apps} available for iOS, Android and other platforms.
The report will be sent to your server moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
Your draft will be lost if you leave Mastodon.
This account is marked as moved to {moved_to_link}, and may thus not accept new follows.
File upload not allowed with polls.
Due to a bug in our code or a browser compatibility issue, this page could not be displayed correctly.
Try refreshing the page. If that does not help, you may still be able to use Mastodon through a different browser or native app.

Your home timeline is empty! Visit {public} or use search to get started and meet other users.

Welcome to the fediverse! In a few moments, you'll be able to broadcast messages and talk to your friends across a wide variety of servers. But this server, {domain}, is special—it hosts your profile, so remember its name.
Posts from people you follow will appear in your home feed. You can follow anyone on any server!
Public posts from people on the same server as you will appear in the local timeline.
Public posts from other servers of the fediverse will appear in the federated timeline.
You can reply to other people's and your own toots, which will chain them together in a conversation.
You can share other people's toots with your followers by boosting them.
You can save a toot for later, and let the author know that you liked it, by favouriting it.
